# GitHub Configuration Documentation

This directory contains internal documentation for repository maintainers and contributors working with GitHub workflows and repository configuration.

## Files

- **EXAMPLE_CONFIG.md** - Configuration examples
- **GPG_README.md** - GPG workflow documentation
- **GPG_SETUP_GUIDE.md** - Guide for setting up GPG signing
- **IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md** - Workflow implementation details
- **NO_GH_PAT_NEEDED.md** - Authentication configuration notes
- **QUICK_REFERENCE.md** - Quick start reference for contributors
- **SETUP_COMPLETE.md** - Setup completion documentation
- **WORKFLOWS_README.md** - Workflow configuration guide
- **WORKFLOW_DIAGRAMS.md** - Visual workflow diagrams

## Purpose

These documents are for repository maintainers and are not intended for end users of the YakaJS library. For user-facing documentation, see the main [README.md](../../README.md) and [docs/](../../docs/) directory.
